title: Markets, Fintech, And ETFs (Podcast)
itunes:title: Markets, Fintech, And ETFs (Podcast)
description:
Ted Oakley, Founder and Managing Partner at Oxbow Advisors, discusses where the market is going amid a dimming economic outlook. Vidya Peters, COO at Marqeta (NASDAQ: MQ), discusses fintech and how consumers are paying for items. Katie Greifeld, cross-asset reporter with Bloomberg News, discusses ETF investing and emerging market ETFs. Alfonso Peccatiello, author of The Macro Compass and formerly of ING, discusses markets and the economy in 2022. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
